import_card.enable_ocr_tooltip:
If enabled, please upload screenshot sorting by Level (レベル).
It uses Tesseract to recognize card level and master rank. This process will take some time.
Training states are retrieved from thumbnail, make sure you use the right one.

step1.title: Step 1: Take a Screenshot
step1.subtitle: Take a screenshot of your box, make sure "Lv.XX" is shown instead of power (only numbers).

step2.title: Step 2: Upload your Screenshot
step2.subtitle:
1: Click and choose your screenshot.
2: Experimentally recognize card level and master rank with OCR (Tesseract).

step3.title: Step 3: Confirm the Result
step3.subtitle:
1: Card thumbnail cropped from your screenshot.
2: Best matched card thumbnail with similarity in percentage.
3: Side story are assumed as all unlocked, remeber to switch it off if not unlocked.
4: Submit and save recognized cards.
5: If the card is wrongly recognized, click it to replace.

step4.title: Appendix: Modify the Result
step4.subtitle:
This dialog is shown if you clicked the matched card thumbnail (red square with number 5 in step 3).
1: Showing other possible matches for this card.
2: If you don't want this card, you can remove it from the list.

label.sekai_id_verify_step_1_subtitle: Tap "Menu" (1) button in the upper right corner, then tap "称号 & プロフィール" (2) button
label.sekai_id_verify_step_2_subtitle: Write your verification token {{verify_token}} to textbox (1), then tap the "Back" (2) button to save. After that click/tap the "VERIFY" button.

sekai_id_delete_confirm.title: Unlink Sekai ID confirmation
sekai_id_delete_confirm.content1: Are you sure to unlink this Sekai ID? All data e.g. event record history will be lost!

sekai_id_transfer.title: Transfer Sekai ID
sekai_id_transfer.content1: As the given Sekai ID is already bound to another user, if you do it on purpose and remembers the username of previous user account, you may enter it in textbox below. If you forget the previous username, you can DM @SekaiViewer on twitter for a manual transfer.

error.sekai_id_verify_failed: Failed to verify ownership, did you leave the profile panel to save?
error.sekai_id_malformed: Sekai ID is the 16 or more digits number, not your username.
error.sekai_id_already_bind: Sekai ID is already bound to another user.
